message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $15,000 feels fair. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 is quite a bit lower than what I had in mind. How about we meet in the middle at $13,500?
I appreciate the effort to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit hesitant. How about we try $11,500? I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
